info.title: Personal
info.description: Check your storage user and account details

advice1.title: What data can be edited?
advice1.description: For strict security reasons and to protect your data at Internxt we do not allow the data of a user account such as email to be modified.

advice2.title: Security account
advice2.description: Your files are encrypted before leaving your device, so only you can access your files, no tricks, no hidden things, just privacy, that’s Internxt.

plans.title: Plans
plans.description: Find the different storage and solution options that Internxt offers

features.title: Premium support
features.description: You will always have the best treatment from our customer service, for us you are part of the family.

features.title: Private
features.description: Internxt is not just another cloud storage solution, we don’t share or sell your data.

features.title: Secure
features.description: We use zero-knowledge to ensure that your data remains private by client-side encrypting it.

advice1.title: Change password
advice1.description: Changing your password will sign you out from all your devices. The password introduced will be needed for logging in again.

advice2.title: What should you keep in mind so that your pasword is secure?

advice3.title: New encryption key
advice3.description: By changing your password, all your files will be un-encrypted with your old password, and then re-encrypted using your new password, and thus you won't lose access to them! This action cannot be undone.

advice4.title: What data can be edited?
advice4.description: For strict security reasons and to protect your data at Internxt we do not allow the data of a user account such as email to be modified.

advice.title: Two-Factor Authentication
advice.description: Two-factor authentication provides an extra layer of security for your Internxt account by requiring a second step of verification when you sign in. In adittion to your password, you’ll also need a code generated by Authy, Google Authenticator or a similar on your phone. Follow the steps below to enable 2FA on your account

download.title: Download authy
download.description: Download Authy, Google Authenticator or a similar app on your device.

error.serverError: Internal server error. Try again later
error.fileAlreadyExists: File with the same name already exists
error.folderAlreadyExists: Folder with the same name already exists
error.anyReferralCredit: You don	 have any credit on your account
error.backupKeyDontMatch: The backup key inserted does not match your unique backup key
error.shareLinkMissingBucket: Cannot generate share link due to missing bucket
error.invalidActivationCode: Your activation code is invalid. Maybe you have used this link before and your account is already activated
error.redirectToStripe: Failed to redirect to Stripe. Please contact us. Reason: {reason}
error.deactivatingAccount: Error deactivating account. Please contact us.
error.uploadingItems: Some of the elements could not be uploaded
error.downloadingItems: Some of the elements could not be downloaded
error.movingItemInsideItself: You can't move a folder inside itself
error.teamInvitation: The invitation email could not be sent
error.noSpaceAvailable: Your Internxt Drive is full. Get more space upgrading your account.
error.inviteAFriend: Error sending the invitation to a friend: {message}

errors.409: A file with that name already exists in the destination folder
A folder with that name already exists in the destination folder

success.twoFactorAuthActivated: Your Two-Factor Authentication has been activated!
success.twoFactorAuthDisabled: Your Two-Factor Authentication has been disabled
success.joinedToTheTeam: You have successfully joined to the team
success.inviteAFriend: An invitation has been sent to {email}

deleteItems.advice: Please confirm that you want to delete these items. This action can't be undone.

plans.advice: You will be redirected to your AppSumo account

inviteAFriend.title: Invite a friend
inviteAFriend.description: Get up to 4GB extra free storage by inviting your friends (1GB per user registered via your invitation)

dialog.title: Subscribe to our newsletter
dialog.message: Get the last news and updates right in your mail inbox

items.install-desktop-app: Install desktop app and upload a file
